title: Did NRTV digitally add Ko Klux Klan Hodes to Thomas?
subtitle: A television segment of the National Broadcasting Agency hosted by Dana Luich raised a controversy in September 2018.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In September 2018, Dana Luich hosted a TV section of the National Broadcasting Agency, in which Thomas presented the characters of the tank that wore the digitally added Ko Klux Klan hood.
